page.title: 02MRS.ADAMS' DAY IN KINNEFF
page.content: This morning I woke at 7a.m. I switched on the television and woke the children. We had breakfast. I dusted and tidied the house and switched on the washing machine. I hoovered, made the beds and hung out the washing. I took my son, Christopher, to Inverbervie by bus to the playgroup. I went shopping and collected Christopher at 11.30a.m. We had lunch at my mother's. We went home by car. I did the ironing. I prepared and served the tea. After tea I switched on the immersion heater and washed the dishes. I bathed the children and put Christopher to bed. Angela, my daughter, put on the electric blankets. We watched television. At 9p.m. Angela went to bed. At 10p.m. I made tea and toast and locked the door. I switched everything off and went to bed.
